description: This file defines the root layout component for a Next.js application, including site metadata, header, and footer components. It sets the global styles and provides consistent site structure across pages.

methods.name: RootLayout
methods.description: Main layout component wrapping all pages with header and footer.

methods.name: Header
methods.description: Navigation bar component with site branding and links.

methods.name: SiteFooter
methods.description: Footer component with site info and links.
